persona.label: Senior Data Engineering Lead
background: Junior team over-relying on Copilot/GPT for data pipelines
Silent logic bugs causing multi-day outages
Leadership believes 'AI replaces the need for senior oversight'
constraints: The 'Senior' task is now primarily debugging AI-hallucinated logic
Technical debt is mounting faster than features are shipped
persona.goal: Position as 'System Reliability Architect' or 'AI Policy Lead' where the value is knowing when AI is wrong.

question.summary: My juniors are shipping Copilot code that breaks every weekend because they don't understand the underlying DBSCAN or SQL logic. Management thinks we don't need 'Senior' salaries anymore.

shouldInclude: Focus on 'Reliability Architect' or 'AI Governance' roles
Mitigation: Implementing 'AI Quality Gates' as a core leadership deliverable
